jTags-standard (suitible for most users) :

Includes: jTagCore with the standard jTags
  • Download: jTags.min.js (for production use)
  • Download: jTags.js (for development purposes)

jTags-Core (for jTag building and development):

Includes only jTagCore (no jTags included)
  • Download: jTags-core.min.js (for jTag building and development)
  • Download: jTags-core.js (for jTagCore development purposes)
